# UITableViewCell.FocusStyle

**Enumeration**

The style of focused cells.

## Declaration

```swift
enum FocusStyle
```

## Overview

You use these constants to set the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewCell/focusStyle-swift.property] property.

## Constants

- **UITableViewCell.FocusStyle.default**: The cell alters its appearance in a standard, system-defined way when it becomes focused.
- **UITableViewCell.FocusStyle.custom**: The cell doesn’t alter its appearance automatically when it becomes focused.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing focus

- **focusStyle**: The appearance of the cell when focused.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
